title: NOLAN'S BATMAN!
content:
Does anyone know the font used in the opening credits/titles from the Nolan batman series: BATMAN BEGINS and THE DARK KNIGHT? Do these films have the same font styles? Thanks anyone!!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115074621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/darkknight-teaser-poster_5660.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141115074621im_/http:/typophile.com/files/untitled_6638.JPG)
author: sombers_eye

comments.content: thanks marcox! God, I love this site!
It's pretty easy to identify Univers, if there is a "G". The form of this letter is unique.

FYI, Batman Begins used Univers on all its marketing materials. The Dark Knight used Univers on some, and Franklin Gothic on others.

- Lex
